   21: %%
   22: -module(ei_encode_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include("ei_encode_SUITE_data/ei_encode_test_cases.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   28:          init_per_testcase/2,
   29:          test_ei_encode_long/1,
   30:          test_ei_encode_ulong/1,
   31:          test_ei_encode_longlong/1,
   32:          test_ei_encode_ulonglong/1,
   33:          test_ei_encode_char/1,
   34:          test_ei_encode_misc/1,
   35:          test_ei_encode_fails/1,
   36:          test_ei_encode_utf8_atom/1,
   37:          test_ei_encode_utf8_atom_len/1]).
   38: 
   39: suite() ->
   40:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   41: 
   42: all() -> 
   43:     [test_ei_encode_long, test_ei_encode_ulong,
   44:      test_ei_encode_longlong, test_ei_encode_ulonglong,
   45:      test_ei_encode_char, test_ei_encode_misc,
   46:      test_ei_encode_fails, test_ei_encode_utf8_atom,
   47:      test_ei_encode_utf8_atom_len].
   48: 
   49: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   50:     runner:init_per_testcase(?MODULE, Case, Config).
   51: 
   52: 
   53: %% ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   54: 
   55: % NOTE: for historical reasons we don't patch as tight as we can,
   56: %       we only fill 27 bits in 32 bit INTEGER_EXT 
   57: 
   58: 
   59: %% ######################################################################## %%
   60: 
   61: test_ei_encode_long(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   62:     P = runner:start(Config, ?test_ei_encode_long),
   63: 
   64:     {<<97,0>>                        ,0}   = get_buf_and_term(P),
   65:     {<<97,255>>                      ,255} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   66:     {<<98,256:32/big-signed-integer>>,256} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   67:     {<<98,-1:32/big-signed-integer>> ,-1}  = get_buf_and_term(P),
   68: 
   69:     {<<98, 16#07ffffff:32/big-signed-integer>>, 16#07ffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   70:     {<<98,-16#08000000:32/big-signed-integer>>,-16#08000000} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   71:     {<<110,4,0, 0,0,0,8>>                     , 16#08000000} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   72:     {<<110,4,1, 1,0,0,8>>                     ,-16#08000001} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   73: 
   74:     {<<110,4,0, 255,255,255,127>>             , 16#7fffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   75:     {<<110,4,1, 0,0,0,128>>                   ,-16#80000000} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   76: 
   77:     runner:recv_eot(P),
   78:     ok.
   79: 
   80: 
   81: %% ######################################################################## %%
   82: 
   83: test_ei_encode_ulong(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   84:     P = runner:start(Config, ?test_ei_encode_ulong),
   85: 
   86:     {<<97,0>>                          ,0}   = get_buf_and_term(P),
   87:     {<<97,255>>                        ,255} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   88:     {<<98,256:32/big-unsigned-integer>>,256} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   89: 
   90:     {<<98, 16#07ffffff:32/big-signed-integer>>,16#07ffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   91:     {<<110,4,0, 0,0,0,8>>                     ,16#08000000} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   92: 
   93:     {<<110,4,0, 255,255,255,127>>             ,16#7fffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   94:     {<<110,4,0, 0,0,0,128>>                   ,16#80000000} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   95:     {<<110,4,0, 255,255,255,255>>             ,16#ffffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
   96: 
   97:     runner:recv_eot(P),
   98:     ok.
   99: 
  100: 
  101: %% ######################################################################## %%
  102: 
  103: test_ei_encode_longlong(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  104:     P = runner:start(Config, ?test_ei_encode_longlong),
  105:     
  106:     {<<97,0>>                        ,0}   = get_buf_and_term(P),
  107:     {<<97,255>>                      ,255} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  108:     {<<98,256:32/big-signed-integer>>,256} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  109:     {<<98,-1:32/big-signed-integer>> ,-1}  = get_buf_and_term(P),
  110:     
  111:     {<<98, 16#07ffffff:32/big-signed-integer>>, 16#07ffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  112:     {<<98,-16#08000000:32/big-signed-integer>>,-16#08000000} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  113:     {<<110,4,0, 0,0,0,8>>                     , 16#08000000} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  114:     {<<110,4,1, 1,0,0,8>>                     ,-16#08000001} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  115:     
  116:     {<<110,4,0, 255,255,255,127>>             , 16#7fffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  117:     {<<110,4,1, 0,0,0,128>>                   ,-16#80000000} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  118:     {<<110,6,0, 255,255,255,255,255,127>>     , 16#7fffffffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  119:     {<<110,6,1, 0,0,0,0,0,128>>               ,-16#800000000000} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  120:     {<<110,8,0, 255,255,255,255,255,255,255,127>>,16#7fffffffffffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  121:     {<<110,8,1, 0,0,0,0,0,0,0,128>>           ,-16#8000000000000000} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  122:     
  123:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  124:     ok.
  125: 
  126: 
  127: %% ######################################################################## %%
  128: 
  129: test_ei_encode_ulonglong(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  130:     P = runner:start(Config, ?test_ei_encode_ulonglong),
  131: 
  132:     {<<97,0>>                          ,0} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  133:     {<<97,255>>                        ,255} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  134:     {<<98,256:32/big-unsigned-integer>>,256} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  135:     
  136:     {<<98, 16#07ffffff:32/big-signed-integer>>,16#07ffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  137:     {<<110,4,0, 0,0,0,8>>              ,16#08000000} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  138: 
  139:     {<<110,4,0, 255,255,255,127>>      ,16#7fffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  140:     {<<110,4,0, 0,0,0,128>>            ,16#80000000} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  141:     {<<110,4,0, 255,255,255,255>>      ,16#ffffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  142:     {<<110,6,0, 255,255,255,255,255,255>>,16#ffffffffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  143:     {<<110,8,0, 255,255,255,255,255,255,255,255>>,16#ffffffffffffffff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  144:     
  145:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  146:     ok.
  147: 
  148: 
  149: %% ######################################################################## %%
  150: %% A "character" for us is an 8 bit integer, always positive, i.e.
  151: %% it is unsigned.
  152: %% FIXME maybe the API should change to use "unsigned char" to be clear?!
  153: 
  154: test_ei_encode_char(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  155:     P = runner:start(Config, ?test_ei_encode_char),
  156: 
  157:     {<<97,  0>>,0} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  158:     {<<97,127>>,16#7f} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  159:     {<<97,255>>,16#ff} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  160: 
  161:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  162:     ok.
  163: 
  164: 
  165: %% ######################################################################## %%
  166: 
  167: test_ei_encode_misc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  168:     P = runner:start(Config, ?test_ei_encode_misc),
  169: 
  170:     <<131>>  = get_binaries(P),
  171: 
  172:     {<<70,_:8/binary>>,F0} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  173:     true = match_float(F0, 0.0),
  174: 
  175:     {<<70,_:8/binary>>,Fn1} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  176:     true = match_float(Fn1, -1.0),
  177: 
  178:     {<<70,_:8/binary>>,Fp1} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  179:     true = match_float(Fp1, 1.0),
  180: 
  181:     {<<$w,5,"false">>,false}  = get_buf_and_term(P),
  182:     {<<$w,4,"true">> ,true}   = get_buf_and_term(P),
  183:     {<<$w,4,"true">> ,true}   = get_buf_and_term(P),
  184:     {<<$w,4,"true">> ,true}   = get_buf_and_term(P),
  185: 
  186:     {<<$w,3,"foo">>,foo}         = get_buf_and_term(P),
  187:     {<<$w,3,"foo">>,foo}         = get_buf_and_term(P),
  188:     {<<$w,0,"">>,''}             = get_buf_and_term(P),
  189:     {<<$w,0,"">>,''}             = get_buf_and_term(P),
  190:     {<<$w,12,"ÅÄÖåäö"/utf8>>,'ÅÄÖåäö'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  191:     {<<$w,12,"ÅÄÖåäö"/utf8>>,'ÅÄÖåäö'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  192: 
  193:     {<<107,0,3,"foo">>,"foo"}       = get_buf_and_term(P),
  194:     {<<107,0,3,"foo">>,"foo"}       = get_buf_and_term(P),
  195:     {<<106>>,""}                    = get_buf_and_term(P),
  196:     {<<106>>,""}                    = get_buf_and_term(P),
  197:     {<<107,0,6,"ÅÄÖåäö">>,"ÅÄÖåäö"} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  198:     {<<107,0,6,"ÅÄÖåäö">>,"ÅÄÖåäö"} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  199: 
  200:     {<<109,0,0,0,3,"foo">>,<<"foo">>}       = get_buf_and_term(P),
  201:     {<<109,0,0,0,0,"">>,<<>>}               = get_buf_and_term(P),
  202:     {<<109,0,0,0,6,"ÅÄÖåäö">>,<<"ÅÄÖåäö">>} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  203: 
  204:     {<<104,0>>,{}}       = get_buf_and_term(P),	% Tuple header for {}
  205:     {<<106>>,[]}         = get_buf_and_term(P),	% Empty list []
  206: 
  207:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  208:     ok.
  209: 
  210: 
  211: %% ######################################################################## %%
  212: 
  213: test_ei_encode_fails(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  214:     P = runner:start(Config, ?test_ei_encode_fails),
  215: 
  216:     XAtom = list_to_atom(lists:duplicate(255, $x)),
  217:     YAtom = list_to_atom(lists:duplicate(255, $y)),
  218: 
  219:     XAtom = get_term(P),
  220:     XAtom = get_term(P),
  221:     YAtom = get_term(P),
  222:     YAtom = get_term(P),
  223: 
  224:     {{{{}}}} = get_term(P),
  225: 
  226:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  227:     ok.
  228: 
  229: 
  230: %% ######################################################################## %%
  231: 
  232: test_ei_encode_utf8_atom(Config) ->
  233:     P = runner:start(Config, ?test_ei_encode_utf8_atom),
  234: 
  235:     {<<119,2,195,133>>,'Å'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  236:     {<<119,2,195,133>>,'Å'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  237:     {<<119,2,195,133>>,'Å'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  238:     {<<119,2,195,133>>,'Å'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  239: 
  240:     {<<119,1,$A>>,'A'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  241:     {<<119,1,$A>>,'A'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  242: 
  243:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  244:     ok.
  245: 
  246: %% ######################################################################## %%
  247: test_ei_encode_utf8_atom_len(Config) ->
  248:     P = runner:start(Config, ?test_ei_encode_utf8_atom_len),
  249: 
  250:     {<<119,2,195,133>>,'Å'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  251:     {<<119,4,195,133,195,132>>,'ÅÄ'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  252:     {<<119,2,195,133>>,'Å'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  253:     {<<119,4,195,133,195,132>>,'ÅÄ'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  254: 
  255:     {<<119,1,$A>>,'A'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  256:     {<<119,2,$A,$B>>,'AB'} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  257:     {<<119,255,_:(255*8)>>,_} = get_buf_and_term(P),
  258: 
  259:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  260:     ok.
  261: 
  262: %% ######################################################################## %%
  263: 
  264: % We read two packets for each test, the ei_encode and ei_x_encode version....
  265: 
  266: get_buf_and_term(P) ->
  267:     B = get_binaries(P),
  268:     case B of
  269:         <<131>> ->
  270:             io:format("(got single magic, no content)\n",[]),
  271:             {B,'$$magic$$'};
  272:         <<131,_>> ->
  273:             T = binary_to_term(B),
  274:             io:format("~w\n~w\n(got magic)\n",[B,T]),
  275:             {B,T};
  276:         _ ->
  277:             B1 = list_to_binary([131,B]),	% No magic, add
  278:             T = binary_to_term(B1),
  279:             io:format("~w\n~w\n(got no magic)\n",[B,T]),
  280:             {B,T}
  281:     end.
  282: 
  283: 
  284: get_binaries(P) ->
  285:     B1 = get_binary(P),
  286:     B2 = get_binary(P),
  287:     B1 = B2.
  288: 
  289: get_binary(P) ->
  290:     case runner:get_term(P) of
  291:         {bytes,L} ->
  292:             B = list_to_binary(L),
  293:             io:format("~w\n",[L]),
  294:             % For strange reasons <<131>> show up as <>....
  295:             %	    io:format("~w\n",[B]),
  296:             B;
  297:         Other ->
  298:             Other
  299:     end.
  300: 
  301: %%
  302: 
  303: % We use our own get_term()
  304: 
  305: get_term(P) ->
  306:     case runner:get_term(P) of
  307:         {bytes,[131]} ->
  308:             io:format("(got single magic, no content)\n",[]),
  309:             '$$magic$$';
  310:         {bytes,[131,L]} ->
  311:             B = list_to_binary(L),
  312:             T = binary_to_term(B),
  313:             io:format("~w\n~w\n(got magic)\n",[L,T]),
  314:             T;
  315:         {bytes,L} ->
  316:             B = list_to_binary([131,L]),
  317:             T = binary_to_term(B),
  318:             io:format("~w\n~w\n(got no magic)\n",[L,T]),
  319:             T;
  320:         Other ->
  321:             Other
  322:     end.
  323: 
  324: %%
  325: 
  326: match_float(F, Match) when is_float(F), is_float(Match), F == Match ->
  327:     true;
  328: match_float(F, Match) when is_float(F), F > Match*0.99, F < Match*1.01 ->
  329:     true.
